div.h3: The Gold Standard in Education; The Foundation of Our Community.

div.span: Dual Credit College Hours Earned in 2019
Dual Credit College Hours Earned in 2019

br.span: If you have a child who will be entering kindergarten for the 2020 - 2021 school year, please fill out our pre-registration form. A staff member from the school will contact you and help you through the enrollment process. We look forward to meeting our new Musketeers next year!

div.a: End of Year NTI Udate - April 22, 2020

span.div: Click the link for answers to Frequently Asked Questions.
Continue to follow us on social media, check your email and follow teacher apps for the latest information.

If students, parents or community members know of an unsafe situation in school (bullying, weapons, drugs or alcohol, etc.), they can anonymously pass on that information to school personnel by using this basic email format.
